casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Jay Lee HOLMES, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 156047
COA: 336318 Supreme Court of Michigan. October 2, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the motion to supplement an issue is GRANTED. The application for leave to appeal the May 12, 2017 order of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because the defendant has failed to meet the burden of establishing entitlement to relief under MCR 6.508(D).

WILDER , J., did not participate because he was on the Court of Appeals panel.
